usage: doc_sync_agent.py autostub [-h] --coverage COVERAGE [--top TOP]
                                  [--inventory INVENTORY]
                                  [--overview OVERVIEW]
                                  [--equations EQUATIONS]

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --coverage COVERAGE   Path to coverage JSON generated by the coverage
                        command.
  --top TOP             Maximum number of unreferenced functions to stub
                        (default: 10).
  --inventory INVENTORY
                        Inventory JSON containing function metadata (default:
                        analysis/inventory.json).
  --overview OVERVIEW   Path to the overview markdown file (default:
                        analysis/overview.md).
  --equations EQUATIONS
                        Path to the equations markdown file (default:
                        analysis/equations.md).
